Name: LU 62 - Landmarks, Melrose Concourse NCP, Bronx (C 240175 PQX)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP Application No. C 240175 PQX, for the acquisition of property located at 1169 Washington Avenue (Block 2389, p/o Lot 47), to facilitate development of a building containing approximately 34 affordable housing units, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 3 (L.U. No. 62; C 240175 PQX).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
